explains: adj. 厌倦的；疲倦不堪的
v. 厌倦（jade 的过去分词）；变得疲倦；精疲力竭
wordGroup: jade bracelet 玉镯，镶玉手镯

sentences.en: We had both become jaded, disinterested, and disillusioned.
sentences.cn: 我们两人都变得厌倦、了无兴趣且心灰意冷了。

sentences.en: I felt terribly jaded after working all weekend.
sentences.cn: 整个周末工作之后我感到疲惫不堪。

sentences.en: It was a meal to tempt even the most jaded palate.
sentences.cn: 这顿饭能使最没胃口的人产生食欲。
